title: She was diagnosed with ALS in her 40s. Here's what she wants you to know about living with the 'bankruptcy disease'
OUCH! Fox News Viewers Get An Uncomfortable Truth About Trump On Live TV
Markets digest bank earnings after recent turmoil
Still haven't filed your taxes? Here's what you need to know
description: So far this tax season, the IRS has received more than 90 million income tax returns for 2022.

title: US Judge Partly Blocks Trump Order Reforming Elections
description: A US judge on Thursday partially blocked an executive order by President Donald Trump aimed at sweeping election reforms, the latest legal setback in enacting his agenda.

title: NYT Slammed By US Government Over Its Reportage Of Kashmir Terror Attack
description: The New York Times has been pulled up by the US government for its reportage of the terror attack in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam, in which 26 people, including a foreign national were shot dead after being asked to prove their allegiance to Islam.

title: Judge halts parts of Trump’s overhaul of US elections, including proof-of-citizenship requirement - AP News
description: Judge halts parts of Trump’s overhaul of US elections, including proof-of-citizenship requirement  AP NewsUS judges block aspects of Trump agenda as president targets Democratic fundraising platform – live  The GuardianJudge pauses parts of Trump's sweeping executive order on voting  NPRTrump's executive order on voting blocked by federal judge amid flurry of legal setbacks  Fox NewsRulings coming fast and furious in lawsuits over Trump's policies on immigration, elections and DEI  AP News

title: Trump says he is 'not happy' with deadly Russian strikes on Kyiv - BBC
description: Trump says he is 'not happy' with deadly Russian strikes on Kyiv  BBCTrump writes ‘Vladimir, STOP!’ after Russia launches deadliest strikes on Kyiv since last summer  CNNUkraine war briefing: Zelenskyy links missile used in Kyiv attack to North Korea  The GuardianTrump Tells Putin to ‘STOP!’ After Deadly Russian Attack on Kyiv  The New York TimesTrump: Russia not taking over Ukraine is a concession  The Hill

title: Trump Tells Putin to ‘STOP!’ After Deadly Russian Attack on Kyiv
description: The attack, which killed at least 12 people, was the deadliest on Ukraine’s capital in nearly a year. President Trump called on President Vladimir V. Putin to “STOP!” in a post on social media.
author: Kim Barker, Maria Varenikova and Brendan Hoffman

title: Red Line on Crimea Isn’t Just Zelensky’s. It’s Ukraine’s.
description: In Ukraine, memories of Russia’s annexation are fresh and resentments run high, leaving the country’s president few choices on the latest American peace plan.
author: Andrew E. Kramer and Maria Varenikova

title: Trump says he is 'not happy' with deadly Russian strikes on Kyiv
description: The overnight strikes killed at least eight people and injured 77 more, local officials have said.

title: Israeli military admits its troops killed UN worker in Gaza Strip
description: Israel had previously denied its troops were responsible for the killing of a UN worker with tank fire on 19 March.

title: Alphabet shares rise on stronger-than-expected revenue growth
description: Alphabet's search and advertising units are still showing strong growth despite AI competition heating up, according to its first-quarter earnings report.

title: Intel CFO says tariffs increase chance for economic slowdown, recession getting likelier
description: Intel's revenue forecast included a "wider than normal" range, which the company said was due to uncertainty caused by tariffs

title: Tanzania opposition officials arrested as Tundu Lissu refuses to appear in court
description: Chadema spokesperson says party’s vice-chair John Heche and secretary general John Mnyika held on way to protest over treason chargesTanzania’s main opposition party said on Thursday at least two of its officials had been arrested on their way to a rally to support the leading government opponent Tundu Lissu, who refused to appear at a virtual court hearing to face a charge of treason.Authorities in the east African country have increasingly cracked down on the opposition Chadema party ahead of presidential and parliamentary polls in October. Continue reading...
author: Agence France-Presse in Dar es Salaam

title: DRC government and M23 agree to halt fighting and work towards truce
description: Both sides say they have resolved to end conflict through peaceful means after ‘frank’ talks facilitated by QatarThe Democratic Republic of the Congo and a coalition of militias including the Rwanda-backed M23 have agreed to work toward a truce to end the fighting that has engulfed the eastern part of the country since January.In similarly worded statements released on Wednesday night, the government and Alliance Fleuve Congo (Congo River Alliance) said their representatives had held talks facilitated by Qatar and resolved to end the conflict through peaceful means. Continue reading...
author: Carlos Mureithi in Nairobi and agencies

title: Musk’s Tesla gets lift as US cuts red tape on self-drive car rules to counter China
description: The Trump administration is easing regulatory hurdles for self-driving cars, aiming to boost US automakers' competitiveness against China. Carmakers can now seek exemptions from certain safety rules for research and demonstrations. While crash reporting will remain, the federal government plans to streamline the process, addressing concerns raised by Tesla CEO Elon Musk about the current system's burdensomeness.
author: TOI World Desk

title: US spokesperson shuns question on India-Pak tensions after Pahalgam attack
description: Amidst India-Pakistan border tensions, a US State Department spokesperson declined to comment, affirming previous statements by US leaders. This follows unwavering US support for India after the deadly Pahalgam terrorist attack, which claimed 26 lives. US President Trump and Vice President Vance conveyed condolences to PM Modi, while Secretary Rubio pledged US solidarity.
author: TOI World Desk

title: U.S. negotiating position on Iran in flux as talks continue
description: As technical talks resume in Oman this weekend, Trump administration officials are seemingly at odds over acceptable terms for an Iran nuclear deal.
author: Karen DeYoung

title: Russian strike on Kyiv draws rare rebuke from Trump; peace talks stall
description: The massive attack on Kyiv and other cities in the early morning came after President Donald Trump expressed frustration with Ukraine’s leadership.
author: Siobhán O'Grady, Anastacia Galouchka
